mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tt_fidx_stss.select */ SELECT stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,stnd_yymm /* stnd_yymm 기준_년월 character(6) */ ,mnth_week_seq /* mnth_week_seq 월별_주차 numeric */ ,week_nm /* week_nm 요일_명 character varying(10) */ ,avg_bmi_val /* avg_bmi_val 평균_BMI_값 numeric */ ,avg_idx /* avg_idx 평균_지수 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tt_fidx_stss WHERE 1 = 1 AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tt_fidx_stss.insert */ INSERT INTO tt_fidx_stss ( stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */
,stnd_yymm /* stnd_yymm 기준_년월 character(6) */
,mnth_week_seq /* mnth_week_seq 월별_주차 numeric */
,week_nm /* week_nm 요일_명 character varying(10) */
,avg_bmi_val /* avg_bmi_val 평균_BMI_값 numeric */ ,avg_idx /* avg_idx 평균_지수 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,#{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */
,#{stndYymm} /* stnd_yymm 기준_년월 character(6) */
,#{mnthWeekSeq} /* mnth_week_seq 월별_주차 numeric */
,#{weekNm} /* week_nm 요일_명 character varying(10) */
,#{avgBmiVal} /* avg_bmi_val 평균_BMI_값 numeric */ ,#{avgIdx} /* avg_idx 평균_지수 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tt_fidx_stss.update */ UPDATE tt_fidx_stss
,stnd_yymm = #{stndYymm} /* stnd_yymm 기준_년월 character(6) */
,mnth_week_seq = #{mnthWeekSeq} /* mnth_week_seq 월별_주차 numeric */
,week_nm = #{weekNm} /* week_nm 요일_명 character varying(10) */
,avg_bmi_val = #{avgBmiVal} /* avg_bmi_val 평균_BMI_값 numeric */
,avg_idx = #{avgIdx} /* avg_idx 평균_지수 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */

) VALUES ( #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */

,#{avgBmiVal} /* avg_bmi_val 평균_BMI_값 numeric */ ,#{avgIdx} /* avg_idx 평균_지수 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */

,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT CONSTRAINT tt_fidx_stss_pkey DO UPDATE SET

,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
